Costco Parking Lot: Starting location. Where Pippin starts his journey to enter Costco.
Costco Entrance: Where Pippin needs to dodge eager shoppers to get inside the store.
Produce Aisle: A location Pippin has to navigate through to avoid more shoppers.
Bakery Aisle: Where Pippin can find the bread buds.
Security Guard Station: A key location to maneuver around to avoid getting caught.
Checkout Lane: Another place where Pippin may run into security guards while navigating to the exit.
Costco Exit: The final location where Pippin can evade the guard and leave the superstore with the bread buds.
